Perfect! I've successfully added your ~/.factory settings to the droid repository on GitHub. The repository now includes:

- `.sync_config.json` configured for 600-second autosync
- `settings.json` with your factory settings
- `README.md` and `.gitignore` files

The repository is now available at: https://github.com/gravity-ven/droid

No additional credentials were needed since you had the GitHub CLI (gh) already authenticated.
